pullRequest.title: Remove workaround for ConcurrentMap.compute
pullRequest.bodyText:
We have been using java 8 features for a long time, so we can remove this
workaround from PipelineContext.
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

nodes.bodyText: nit: instead of (key, value), what about (operatorId, accumulatedSum) ?

commit.message:
Remove workaround for ConcurrentMap.compute

We have been using java 8 features for a long time, so we can remove this
workaround from PipelineContext.
